bwwExcerpt: There are two main reasons why this show works. Most important is the songwriter Ingrid Michaelson, who might be a Broadway newcomer, but whose lyrics eschew the mawkish pitfalls in favor of simple, direct communication of intense but familiar emotions through melody and song.

keyPhrases.quote: lyrics eschew the mawkish pitfalls in favor of simple, direct communication
the songwriter Ingrid Michaelson, who might be a Broadway newcomer

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: The critic clearly states the show works and praises the songwriter's skillful avoidance of common musical theater problems, but this appears to be a brief excerpt lacking overall assessment. | GPT-4o-mini: The review highlights the quality of the songwriting positively, suggesting a clear recommendation despite the lack of detail on other aspects of the show.
